# axisA

**Instance Property**

The axis along which the first body can slide, relative to the node containing it.

## Declaration

```swift
var axisA: SCNVector3 { get set }
```

## Managing the Characteristics of a Slider Joint

- **bodyA**: The first physics body connected by the joint.
- **anchorA**: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the first body.
- **bodyB**: The second physics body connected by the joint.
- **axisB**: The axis along which the second body can slide, relative to the node containing it.
- **anchorB**: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the second body.
